channel.title: MySociety Civic Technology Conference, Barcelona 27-28 April
channel.description: Anyone submitting a proposal for the MySociety Civic Tech conference in Milan in April on IATI? Or want to do a joint proposal on using IATI data (ie what's the use of IATI data to civic technologists?)? Deadline is 5 Feb (this Friday). https://www.mysociety.org/research/tictec-2016/

item.title: MySociety Civic Technology Conference, Barcelona 27-28 April
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.source: MySociety Civic Technology Conference, Barcelona 27-28 April

item.title: MySociety Civic Technology Conference, Barcelona 27-28 April
item.dc:creator: nick_winnett
item.description:
Sorry, we’ve only just spotted this. PWYF have just had a session accepted on the use of IATI data, a workshop to discuss what the issues are and what role - if any - civic tech can play.

Have you or anyone else pitched anything? We are just waiting to see who else is involved in our session - assuming different proposals are being merged together.

Read full topic
item.source: MySociety Civic Technology Conference, Barcelona 27-28 April

item.title: MySociety Civic Technology Conference, Barcelona 27-28 April
